item.title: LEGO F1 Minifigure Scanner: A Quick Build with GPT-5 and Cursor
item.description: In this post, I share how I built a lightweight web app that scans LEGO F1 blind box Data Matrix codes to identify the minifigure inside. Using Cursor and the GPT-5 model, I put this together in under an hour - saving my nephews from costly duplicate boxes.
